entities.Hospital indemnity insurance: Covers some of your hospital stay costs.
entities.hospital confinement: Hospital confinement refers to being admitted to a hospital for treatment following an accident.
entities.Air Ambulance: Coverage for transportation via air ambulance related to accidents.
entities.Ambulance: Benefit amount for ground ambulance services following an accident.
entities.Blood/Plasma/Platelets: Coverage payment for blood, plasma, or platelets received due to an accident.
entities.Burns: Compensation for treatment of burns related to accidents, graded by severity and area.
entities.Hospital Admission: This benefit pays $1,000 for hospital admission following an accident.
entities.Hospital ICU Admission: This benefit pays $2,000 for ICU admission due to injuries from an accident.
entities.Hospital ICU Confinement: This benefit pays $400 per day for confinement in the ICU after an accident, up to 15 days.
entities.Rehabilitation Unit Confinement: Benefits of $100 per day for up to 15 days are provided for confinement in a rehabilitation unit.
entities.Surgery (Cranial, Open Abdominal, Thorac: Benefits are available for surgery with a maximum schedule of up to $1,000.
entities.Traumatic Brain Injury: A nondegenerative injury to the brain requiring hospital confinement for 48 hours or more due to a covered accident.
